name: Investing App
description: Team project of 4 seeking to provide users with the ability to invest in the stock market to gain experience investing without risking their finances. Seamlessly allowing users to buy and sell stocks, track their performance, and communicate with other users to increase their financial literacy.
technologies: React, Node, Mongoose, MongoDb, Express, Firebase, Netlify, Heroku, Bootstrap

name: Savings & Expense goal
description: Continuing on the theme of financial literacy, I developed a savings and expense tracking app to allow users to set a savings goal and see how long it will take to reach it. Users can input their expenses and savings when they occur and immediately see how it has affected the time to reach their goal.
technologies: Django, Python, Materialize CSS, Jquery, Chartjs, bit.io, Netlify, Heroku

name: Travel-App
description: A web application that allow users to create and track their travel plans. Uers can add their trip accomidations and places they want to visit while their.
technologies: Node.js, Express, MongoDb, Javascript, Jquery, CSS, Bootstrap

name: BlackJack
description: Created a Blackjack web application that utilizes javascript algorithms to provide an engaging user experience while playing against the dealer. Implemenet Ajax request to API to generate card deck.
